name: Ghost legend
description: This is a racing simulation game with a bicycle themed gameplay, where you can showcase your skills to compete in cycling competitions. With more exciting and exciting game graphics, you can choose different time periods to embark on cycling challenges. Although bike games are not as exciting as motorcycles and racing cars, awesome still has a strong sense of realism when playing many games. In the game, players control the contestant to drive a bicycle and embark on a crazy journey, each segment being fun. You showcase your cycling skills on various tracks and win more gold medals that belong to you. There are many scenes and levels in the game waiting for you to challenge, and dozens of cool models waiting for you to unlock and experience.
